mapper.select: SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS NUM , A.COUNTRY , A.CONFIRMED , A.DEATHS , A.RECOVERED , DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATED_DATE, '%m.%d 00:00') AS UPDATEDDATE FROM DEV_CORONA.WORLD_DAILY A, (SELECT @rownum:=0) B WHERE DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATED_DATE, '%y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y%m%d') ORDER BY A.CONFIRMED DESC

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS NUM , DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATED_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS UPDATEDDATE , A.CONFIRMED , A.DEATHS , A.RECOVERED FROM DEV_CORONA.WORLD_DAILY A, (SELECT @rownum:=0) B WHERE A.COUNTRY = #{COUNTRY} ORDER BY A.UPDATED_DATE DESC
